fieldset.name: settings
fieldset.label: Settings
fieldset.description: These are global operation settings for EasyStaging Plans.

field.name: max_allowed_packet
field.label: Max Data per Step
field.description: The maximum amount of data (in Kb) that should be in any single SQL export step. (A table bigger than this will be processed in several steps.)

field.name: default_table_action
field.label: Default Table Action
field.description: The default action that table will be set to when creating a new plan.

field.name: default_added_table_action
field.label: Default Added Tables Action
field.description: The default action that table will be set to when new tables are found that don't currently exist in the plan.
